content: As of now, the golfer who holds the record for the highest career earnings on the PGA Tour is Tiger Woods. According to the official PGA Tour website, Woods has earned over $120 million in prize money during his career on the tour. This impressive sum is a testament to Woods' incredible talent, consistency, and longevity as a professional golfer. In addition to his tournament earnings, Woods has also secured numerous lucrative endorsement deals over the years, making him one of the wealthiest athletes in the world.
